column1: Table 3: Adult (19+) Aims Started by Learners Observed Claiming Benefits in Matched Data, 2011/12

column3: Year to Date August to January (provisional as at 29/03/12)

column1: Total aims started by learners observed claiming benefits in matched data

1. Matched data figures are sourced from a joint DWP/BIS analytical project set up to develop a matched database incorporating key datasets across BIS, DWP and HMRC. Please see http://www.thedataservice.org.uk/statistics/other_statistics_and_research/ for more details.
2. Active benefits include Employment and Support Allowance - Work Related Activity Group (ESA WRAG) and Jobseeker's Allowance (JSA).

3. Other benefits included here are other Employment Support Allowance groups (i.e. excluding ESA-WRAG), Income Support, Incapacity Benefit, Severe Disablement Allowance, and Pension Credit for men aged 60-64
4. Volumes are rounded to the nearest 100.
5. '-' Indicates a base value of less than 50.
